Uses of Interface
rt.Material

  • Packages that use Material 
    Package Description
    rt
    Core classes and interfaces for an educational ray tracer.
    rt.intersectables
    Implementations of the Intersectable interface.
    rt.materials
    Implementations of the Material interface.
    rt.testscenes
    Simple test scenes to compare your renderer to a reference solution.
